Name: filter-by-contextual-association
Description: Allow you to filter items on a node depending on a Contextual association with the first parent

Options.Description: Set the layout javascript class name you want to use to display this node
Set the id of the node which should be display if the Contextual association exist
Set the id of the node which should be display if the Contextual association not exist

Options.DisplayName: Object of the objectPage as contextual object
Options.Description: Set object of the object page as contextual object
